name: Repairing humans: The spinal battle.
description:
The game I did for Global Game Jam 2020. The theme was “repair”.

You have to repair a human spine. Help he walk again!

I did it at the two days(01/02/2020 weekend) and not at a jam site.

So I could not participate in prizes and all. 

Please leave a comment. 

I love reviews so I can make it better. #GGJ #GGJ20 #GGJ2020
